title: Gymnastics! Fundamentals and techniques. Pt. 1
brief_description: Illustrates fundamentals and techniques through the use of close-ups, slow-motion and regular photography. Includes demonstrations on parallel bars, of standard turns, rolls, and stands; rope-climbing; use of the long-horse in vaulting exercises; and tumbling fundamentals such as rolls, handstands, cartwheels, Hecht, somersaults and handsprings.
